description: Hyperlink formatting. Creates a clickable link to an external or internal resource.

href.description: The URL destination of the hyperlink

rel.description: Defines the relationship between the current document and the linked resource (e.g., nofollow, noopener)

target.description: Specifies where to open the linked document (e.g., _blank, _self)

title.description: Additional information about the link, typically shown as a tooltip on hover

attrs.description: Link attributes that define the hyperlink behavior and destination
